+1

I skimmed this. Mostly checked for wire compatibility, looks ok.

Provisionally I plan to commit this, as long as:

  • Unit tests pass, especially the new one (repeatedly) - I'll check it
  • A pass through the API compat checker doesn't turn up anything relevant

Thanks Andrew Purtell for your review.

I notice the javadoc and findbug have no relates with the patch.
